titleStmt.title: Fortune's uncertainty, or, Youth's unconstancy wherein is contained a true and impartial account of what hapned [sic] in the space of a few years to the author, whom you will know in this ensuing discourse by the name of Rodolphvs.
titleStmt.author: Croke, Charles, 1590 or 91-1657.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Charles Croke. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
